attributes.action: FREE SCHOOL DINNERS FOR SINGLE PARENTS ON A LOW INCOME RECEIVING WORKING TAX CREDIT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I RECENTLY STARTED WORKING, I HAVE ONE SON WHO IS 6,I HAVE TO RENT PRIVATELY AS I AM UNABLE TO AFFORD TO BUY A HOME. I CAN ONLY WORK 16 HOURS A WK AT THE RATE OF 5.35PH. OTHERWISE IT WILL AFFECT MY RENT ALLOWANCE I RECEIVE FROM THE COUNCIL, SO I EARN £370.00 PER MONTH,AND HAVE TO PAY £250.00 OF THAT BACK TO THE COUNCIL TOWARDS RENT AND COUNCIL TAX, I THINK I SHOULD BE ENTILTED TO FREE SCHOOL MEALS FOR MY SON ON SUCH A LOW INCOME, IT IS NOT WORTH MY WHILE WORKING WHY CAN THE GOVERMENT NOT SEE THIS.

rejection.details: Please resubmit without the excessive use of block capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
